document_data.caption: A map showing Mother Jatha's north of Fish Street.
document_data.name: Mother Jatha's
document_data.mainbody: '''Mother Jatha's''' was a shop located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The building was one story tall.
document_data.Location: Mother Jatha's was located in the central section of the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] in a neighborhood that sat just north of the eastern end of [[Fish Street (Waterdeep)|Fish Street]].
